short_summary: W6399-21LD57 Services and Technical Support Contract
description: W6399-21LD57 Contrat de Support en Services et Technologies
full_summary:
=================================

**Summary (Résumé)**
--------------------

*   Tender Title: W6399-21LD57 Services and Technical Support Contract
*   Tender Reference: WS4011661071
*   Amendment: 1
*   Tender Status: Expiring on July 28th, 2023 at 2:00 PM Eastern Time.
*   Contract Start Date: Expected to begin on September 1st, 2023
*   Contract Category: Service (SRV)
*   NOC (National Occupational Classification) Category: Military Science and Research
*   Procurement Method: Advance Contract Award Notice

**Tender Announcement (Appel à cotisations)**
--------------------------------------------

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is issuing an Advance Contract Award Notice for the W6399-21LD57 Services and Technical Support Contract. 

The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking a service provider for the provision of services and technical support. The expected start date for the contract is September 1st, 2023. 

**Tender Information (Information relative à l'invitation à cotisation)**
------------------------------------------------------------------------

*   Tender Reference: WS4011661071
*   Amendment Number: 1
*   Tender Closing Date: July 28th, 2023, at 2:00 PM Eastern Time.
*   Expected Contract End Date: Not specified in this notice.

**Contracting Entity and End User Information**
----------------------------------------------

The contracting entity for this tender is the Department of Public Works and Government Services (SPAC) located at 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada. 

The end user entities for these services are the Department of National Defence (DND) located at 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, Ontario K1A0K2, Canada.

**Contact Information (Information de contact)**
----------------------------------------------

*   Name: Jean-Renaud Proulx
*   Email: jean-renaud.proulx@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
*   Department: SPAC/PSPC

**Attachment and Other Information (Pièces jointes et autres informations)**
-------------------------------------------------------------------------

There are no attachments or additional information available related to this tender.

**Please Note: All Tender-related Information and Correspondence**
------------------------------------------------------------------
